content: bernadette is the fourth floral granny square in the welcoming blanket 1 a mystery crochet along for a throw blanket made up of nine 12 floral granny square patterns with borders bernadette has a 2-color gerbera flower at the center which is similar to the one used in the gerbera 6 square 2 > **this pattern is available for free on my blog here 3 ** > > the free version is supported by > advertising on my website the > downloadable pdf for sale on ravelry > includes the full pattern in one > printable file without advertisements **skills used** basic crochet stitches chain double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch crocheting in the round increasing crocheting in the front loop only and back loop only includes links to video tutorial crocheting in chain spaces includes video tutorial special stitch pattern bob fpsc includes written instructions and video tutorial in pattern **skill level** easy **finished size** 12 30 5 cm square **materials** caron one pound yarn 100% acrylic 16 oz/454 g/812 yd/742 m 1 skein each in 02005 sun yellow ca 10517 rose cb and 10620 grass green *or approximately 60 yd 55 m in ca 75 yd 68 5 m in cb and 50 yd 46 m in cc in any medium weight yarn* clover amour us size j-10/6 mm crochet hook *or size needed to obtain gauge* yarn needle **gauge**  motif = 12 30 5 cm square *exact gauge is not critical for this project * 1 https //undergroundcrafter com/2024/05/24/welcoming-blanket-crochet-along/ 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/gerbera---6-square 3 https //undergroundcrafter com/2024/06/21/crochet-pattern-bernadette-floral-granny-square/
